description: [Frankenstein](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0101) has established persistence through a scheduled task using the command: /Create /F /SC DAILY /ST 09:00 /TN WinUpdate /TR , named "WinUpdate".(Citation: Talos Frankenstein June 2019)

external_references.description: Adamitis, D. et al. (2019, June 4). It's alive: Threat actors cobble together open-source pieces into monstrous Frankenstein campaign. Retrieved May 11, 2020.
